scripts.pod: cd ios && rm  -rf Pods && rm  -rf build && rm  -rf Podfile.lock && pod install && pod install --repo-update && pod update && cd ..
scripts.reset: cd android &&./gradlew cleanBuildCache &&./gradlew clean && cd .. && watchman watch-del-all && rimraf  -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rimraf  -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* &&  rimraf  -rf node_modules/ &&  yarn cache clean && npm install && yarn &&   yarn start -- --reset-cache
scripts.bundle:ios: rm  -rf ios/main.jsbundle  &&  react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.fix:android: rimraf  -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rimraf  -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/*.json  && rimraf  -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/*.ttf  && rimraf  -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/*.html
scripts.bundle:android: rimraf  -rf android/app/src/main/assets/*.bundle  && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/  && yarn fix:android && yarn android:drawable
scripts.android:drawable: mkdir android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  mkdir android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  mkdir android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi &&  mkdir android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi &&  mkdir android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && yarn android:copy
scripts.android:copy: cp android/app/src/main/res/drawable/*  android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  cp android/app/src/main/res/drawable/* android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  cp android/app/src/main/res/drawable/* android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi&&  cp android/app/src/main/res/drawable/* android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi &&  cp android/app/src/main/res/drawable/* android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi
scripts.deploy:android: npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean   &&  ./gradlew app:assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.install:android: cd android/app/build/outputs/apk/release && adb install app-arm64-v8a-release.apk && cd ../../../../..
scripts.rename: yarn global add react-native-rename && npx react-native-rename 'ornekapp' -b com.ornekapp.exchange
